channel.title: Recent courses :: Rik's Treehouse
channel.description: Here are some recent courses Iâ€™ve taught.

item.title: UBC CPSC 110
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: Computation, Programs, and Programming Fundamental program and computation structures. Introductory programming skills. Computation as a tool for information processing, simulation and modelling, and interacting with the world.

item.title: UBC CPSC 107
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: Systematic Program Design Fundamental computation and program structures. Continuing systematic program design from CPSC 103.

item.title: UBC ISCI 320
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: Research Development Project Retreat to develop skills in writing scientific research proposals. Emphasis on formulating and testing hypotheses to explain observations.
